name: helper-messages
description: Mojira Helper Message application for use by bug tracker moderators and helpers.

scripts.build-dev: npm run-script copy-bootstrap && browserify assets/js/index.js -o bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run-script copy-bootstrap && browserify assets/js/index.js | terser > bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npm run-script build && copyfiles index.html bundle.js ../helper-message-dist/ && copyfiles assets/**/*.* ../helper-message-dist/ && cd .. && cd helper-message-dist && git add * && git commit -m "Auto deploy" && git push origin gh-pages

author: Bemoty
